note: Busan's night views are varied — highlights include Gwangan Bridge (Gwangalli Beach), Busan Tower, and the sunset from Gamcheon Village. If adding Andong Hahoe Village, allow approx. 1.5 hrs by bus from Gyeongju. The Andong International Mask Dance Festival (late Sep–early Oct) is recommended as a separate full-day excursion. After the Gyeongsang module, connecting to the Jeolla module involves approx. 2 hrs 30 min by bus to Jeonju.
